attributes.action: create a Justice system that is fair to victims of crime.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
create a Justice system that is fair to victims of crime.
After having first hand experience of the Justuce system it is evident there are short fallings in protecting the victim. 
Although defendents are innocent until proven guilty, what about the victims of crime who have to endure giving evdidence against these disrespectful people? 
Defendents have the right to sack their barristers even if this is half way through a trial that has caused the victim undue stress. They have the right to put the victim through hell and the right to read all statements to prepare for trial.
This is unfair as the victim suffers all along.
Please sign this petition and help to change the Justice system to a fairer system.
